name: Jump'it
description:
What is Jump'it? 

Jump'it is a challenging bitesize 2d platformer with 15 small unique levels. I developed Jump'it as a way to test my level design skills and to learn more about Unity and C#.

How to play? 

  • Uses the left and right arrow keys to move. 
  • Uses the space bar to jump. 
  • Tap the space bar to perform a short jump.
  • Hold down the space bar to perform a longer and higher jump.
